Key Match Events: England topped their Euro 2024 group but failed to score in a goalless draw against Slovenia
Bukayo Saka had a goal disallowed due to offside in the first half
Slovenia dug in for a draw towards the end, making England's task even harder
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate will be under more scrutiny given that England have scored just two goals in three group games thus far
Despite the draw, England are guaranteed a place in the knockouts
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's last-16 opponents are yet to be confirmed, with the Netherlands a possibility
England are now on the opposite side of the draw to Germany, Spain, Portugal, and France, so cannot meet any of those sides until the final
